headline: Garrick J. Rochow Elected to the Hubbell Incorporated  Board of Directors
summary: Shelton, CT, Nov. 19, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Board of Directors of Hubbell Incorporated (NYSE: HUBB) announces the election of Garrick J. Rochow as a Director of the company effective November 19, 2024. This addition to the Hubbell Board brings the total number of Directors to ten, of which nine are independent. Hubbell’s Chairman, President and CEO, Gerben Bakker said, “On behalf of the Board of Directors, I am pleased to welcome Garrick to Hubbell. His leadership and deep understanding o
